docs.summary: API to collect RSVPs

permissions.name: Manage Guest List
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event tickets, guest lists and RSVPs.

docs.summary: Updates multiple RSVPs - status only.

permissions.name: Manage Guest List
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event tickets, guest lists and RSVPs.

docs.summary: Updates multiple RSVPs - status only.
Checks-in an RSVP.

body:
curl -X POST 'https://www.wixapis.com/events/v1/rsvp/check-in?eventId=fd56076c-38f4-4705-b9eb-ec322b85c745&rsvpId=7c9dbf44-359c-47c7-a3e4-02638ab851c4&guestId=1' \
-H 'Authorization: <AUTH TOKEN>'

params.name: options
params.doc:
Create RSVP options.
 WIX_EVENTS.MANAGE_RSVP permission is required.

docs.summary: Creates an RSVP, associated with a contact of the site.

examples.title: Create RSVP

extra.description: This example show the minimum required data for RSVP. Applicable if only no additional form fields was added to registration form.

examples.title: Create member RSVP

extra.description: This RSVP is created for an existing site member. Member can have only one RSVP per event.

examples.title: Create RSVP with additional guests

extra.description: The additional guests control has to be added to the registration form.

examples.title: Create RSVP with full address input

extra.description: The full address input mus be added to the form configuration. Address values are sent as an array in following order: street address, city, subdivision (state), country, postal code.

permissions.name: Manage Guest List
permissions.description: Request permission to read, create and change event tickets, guest lists and RSVPs.

params.name: rsvps
params.doc: RSVPs to delete. When not returned, all RSVPs associated with this event are deleted.

docs.summary: Deletes an RSVP.

body:
curl -X DELETE 'https://www.wixapis.com/events/v1/events/fd56076c-38f4-4705-b9eb-ec322b85c745/rsvp?rsvps=7c9dbf44-359c-47c7-a3e4-02638ab851c4' \
-H 'Authorization: <AUTH TOKEN>'

permissions.name: Read Event Tickets and Guest List
permissions.description: Request permission to read event tickets and guest lists.

params.name: fieldset
params.doc: Controls which data is returned. See [Fieldset](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/fieldset#wix-events_wix-events_fieldset_rsvp-fieldset).

docs.summary: Retrieves an RSVP.

body:
curl -X GET 'https://www.wixapis.com/events/v1/events/fd56076c-38f4-4705-b9eb-ec322b85c745/rsvp/fb97100a-98e2-4579-a61c-e71a3501b085?fieldset=FORM&fieldset=DETAILS' \
-H 'Authorization: <AUTH TOKEN>'

permissions.name: Read Event Tickets and Guest List
permissions.description: Request permission to read event tickets and guest lists.

params.name: offset
params.doc: Number of items to skip. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

params.name: limit
params.doc: Number of items to load. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

params.name: fieldset
params.doc: Controls which data is returned. See [Fieldset](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/fieldset#wix-events_wix-events_fieldset_rsvp-fieldset).

params.name: facet
params.doc:
Facet counts to include in the response.
 See [supported facets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-query-rsvps).

params.name: searchPhrase
params.doc: Textual search filter - search is performed on "full_name" and "email".

params.name: eventCreatorId
params.doc: Event creator id filter, by default any.

docs.summary: Retrieves a list of up to 100 RSVPs, given the provided [paging](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination), [filtering & sorting](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-query-rsvps).

examples.title: List RSVPs with event filter
body:
curl -X GET 'https://www.wixapis.com/events/v1/rsvp?offset=0&limit=2&eventId=fd56076c-38f4-4705-b9eb-ec322b85c745&order=created:asc,modified:desc&fieldset=DETAILS&status=YES' \
-H 'Authorization: <AUTH TOKEN>'

examples.title: Calculate facets by RSVP status
body:
curl -X GET 'https://www.wixapis.com/events/v1/rsvp?limit=0&facet=status' \
-H 'Authorization: <AUTH TOKEN>'

examples.title: List only member RSVPs
body:
curl -X GET 'https://api.wix.com/events/v1/rsvp?offfset=0&limit=1&membersOnly=true' \
-H 'Authorization: <AUTH TOKEN>'

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs. Facet counts aggregated per value

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type integer

members.name: counts
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs. Facet counts aggregated per value

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Subdivision. Usually a state, region, prefecture, or province code, according to [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address info. Usually contains Apt, Suite, and Floor.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number as free text.

members.name: inputValues
members.doc:
Input values entered upon ticket order.    

Max: 200 inputs per form

members.name: value
members.doc:
Text entered into the input field.    

Max: 5000 characters

members.name: values
members.doc:
Multiple selection values. For example, the array will be filled if several checkboxes are ticked.    

Max: 100 items, 5000 characters per item

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID associated with this RSVP.

members.name: anonymized
members.doc: Whether RSVP is anonymized by GDPR delete.

members.name: index
members.doc: Index in the RSVP guest list.

members.name: paths
members.doc: The set of field mask paths.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Number of items to skip. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load. See [Pagination](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/getting-started/pagination).

members.name: fieldset
members.doc: Controls which data is returned. See [Fieldset](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/fieldset#wix-events_wix-events_fieldset_rsvp-fieldset).

members.name: facet
members.doc:
Facet counts to include in the response.
 See [supported facets](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/wix-events/wix-events/filter-and-sort#wix-events_wix-events_filter-and-sort_list-query-rsvps).

members.name: searchPhrase
members.doc: Textual search filter - search is performed on "full_name" and "email".

members.name: eventCreatorId
members.doc: Event creator id filter, by default any.

members.name: guestsCheckIn
members.doc: Number of guests who have checked-in.

members.doc: Whether to ignore notification settings (when hen true, no notifications to contact or user are sent).

members.name: ignoreLimits
members.doc: Whether to create/update regardless of event guest limit.

members.doc: Whether to ignore the form validation.

members.doc: Notifications silenced for this domain event.

members.name: memberId

members.doc: Whether RSVP was anonymized by GDPR delete.

members.name: onlineConferencingLogin

members.name: silent
members.doc: Notifications silenced for this domain event.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_SUBDIVISION_TYPE
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_1 - State
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_2 - County
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_3 - City/town
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_4 - Neighborhood/quarter
  • ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_5 - Street/block
  • COUNTRY - ADMINISTRATIVE_AREA_LEVEL_0. Indicates the national political entity, and is typically the highest order type returned by the Geocoder.

Possible values are:
  • YES
  • NO
  • WAITING

Possible values are:
  • FULLY_CHECKED_IN - Return only rsvps with all guests checked-in
  • NOT_FULLY_CHECKED_IN - Return only rsvps with not all guests checked-in
  • MEMBER - Return only member rsvp

Possible values are:
  • DETAILS - Include RSVP details: created, modified, first_name, last_name, etc.
  • FORM - Include rsvp_form.
  • CONTACT_DETAILS - Include RSVP email.
